promptVersions.body:
Chatter is a great way to drive engagement and share information.


  • Explain Chatter to your team so that they’re ready to engage and respond to posts, and communicate about their work.
  • Create a Chatter group to centralize updates on various topics. Be sure to @mention users on updates so that they get a notification.
  • Use the poll post type to ask for input. User can vote to tell you what kind of functionality they need.
